desc: MC Cowhammer | 2015 Red Roan Stallion | Metallic Cat x Gunsmart Gay x Playgun | 5 Panel N/N MC Cowhammer is currently being trained by Trevor Carter of Carter Ranch Horse in Clovis, NM and being shown in the disciplines of Reined Cowhorse and Ranch Horse Versatility. MC Cowhammer was bred by Bogle Brothers LLC
